sets.name: 4x4 with Powerboat
sets.description:
Head for the coast aboard the awesome 4x4 with Powerboat!

The powerboat championships are underway. Help the LEGO® City powerboat team to get their awesome craft to the harbor race. Jump aboard the high-powered 4x4, start her up and head for the coast. This huge, orange and black race boat with tinted cockpit and tilting high-performance outboard motor is tipped as a top contender—it’s going to be a great day’s boat racing! Includes 2 powerboat driver minifigures with assorted accessories

  • Includes 2 powerboat driver minifigures with assorted accessories
  • Features a pickup truck, trailer and a powerboat
  • Accessories include a crash helmet, mug, life vest, binoculars and an adjustable wrench
  • Check out the sporty orange and black color scheme
  • Unload the awesome powerboat
  • Tilt the powerful outboard motor
  • Power over the waves at breakneck speed!
  • Pickup measures over 2” (6cm) high, 5” (14cm) long and 2” (6cm) wide
  • Trailer measures over 1” (4cm) high, 11” (28cm)long and 2” (6cm) wide
  • Powerboat measures over 2” (6cm) high, 9” (25cm) long and 2” (6cm) wide
